attributes.action: Make Train tickets transferable for fans who lose out to TV fixture changes
attributes.background: Fans are affected throughout the season by fixture changes to suit broadcasters. This leads to 'proper fans' being left out of pocket with changes to trains and hotels already booked. We propose rail tickets for sport travel are transferable for free to avoid fans paying twice to watch their team

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the train operating companies and not the UK Government and Parliament.
